title: Cafe 1901
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Set in a historical building with three levels of couches, booths, and tables set amongst a library-like setting. Menu includes several veg choices including veg pizza and "the veggie works" fries. Offers coffee from the Canadian brand Kicking Horse. Located near Beihai Park, 2 blocks from the Xisi subway stop.
